Title: 200 - Boids Simulation
Tip: Use the Boids simulation as a stress test.

Summary.What: Boids is a simulation of flocking birds that shows the impact of large numbers of shapes on performance.
Summary.Why: Model / shape separation is important for future integrations but can degrade performance, so ongoing performance testing is important.
Summary.How: All boids must recalculate their position and velocity every frame, which is very demanding.

Samples.Tip: The Boids can be drawn inside a single shape
The Boids can be many shapes on a page
The Boids can be many types of shapes
With SignalR, the Boids can be distributed
